meta.content: Bryan Independent School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Bryan, TX.

h1.a: Classes are Online for the Remainder of the School Year

article.div: Governor Abbott declared that all Texas school campuses will remain closed for the rest of the school year

h1.a: 5TH SIX WEEKS REPORT CARD AVAILABLE IN THE HOME ACCESS CENTER

article.div: PARENTS CAN NOW LOG INTO THE HOME ACCESS TO REVIEW THEIR CHILD'S REPORT CARD FROM THE 5TH SIX WEEKS.
Updates regarding Schoology, Good Friday & Grab & Go Meals

h1.a: PHASE 2 OF AT-HOME LEARNING IN BRYAN ISD BEGINS MONDAY, APRIL 6

article.div: BRYAN ISD WILL MOVE INTO PHASE 2 OF AT-HOME LEARNING ON MONDAY, APRIL 6. STUDENTS WILL LEARN FROM THEIR TEACHERS AND COMPLETE DAILY ASSIGNMENTS THROUGH THE PROGRAM SCHOOLOGY.

div.div: Making an active effort to make things better for others
Having the determination to work hard
Having a positive attitude and expecting the best possible outcomes
Having the mind and heart to persevere through difficulties, opposition or fear
